notes: On 29 October 2022, two suicide vehicle-borne IEDs (SVBIED) by Al Shabaab detonated at the perimeter wall of the Ministry of Education targeting civilians at the KM4 area, Zoobe junction in Mogadishu - Hodan (Banadir). The first explosion went off around lunch time, and passers-by including journalists rushed to the scene. The second explosion went off nearby the building shortly after. In total, over 121 people including government officials, journalists, a Hodan police commander (off duty), business owners and two suicide bombers were killed. Over 300 other people were injured. Al Shabaab claimed targeting the Ministry of Education for its role in the offensive and the curriculum against Al Shabaab ideologies.
